name: Forty rules
title: Blends historical fiction with contemporary themes, exploring love, spirituality, and Rumi's teachings.

name: Roomie
title: A heartwarming contemporary romance about two unlikely roommates who find unexpected love amidst their temporary living arrangement.

name: Sports Stars
title: Celebrates the achievements and legacies of legendary athletes across various sports.

name: Curfew
title: A coming-of-age story set against the backdrop of a city under curfew, exploring themes of rebellion, friendship, and self-discovery.

name: Food Detectives
title: Follows a group of young detectives solving culinary mysteries in Kamogawa, blending food and intrigue.

name: The Himalayas
title: Chronicles an adventurous journey deep into the breathtaking landscapes and cultures of the Himalayas.

name: The Enemy
title: A gripping thriller that explores espionage, deception, and the hunt for a dangerous adversary.

name: The Match
title: An intense sports drama that follows the thrilling journey of a pivotal match, filled with suspense and passion.
